name: tc
description: A desktop chat client for Twitch

build.copyright: Copyright 2015 Andrea Stella. All rights reserved

version-string.FileDescription: Tc, the chat client for Twitch

win.description: Tc, the chat client for Twitch
win.title: Tc, the chat client for Twitch

releases.name: Version 6.1
releases.body: - Fixed bttv emotes needing multiple tabs to cycle through

releases.name: Version 6
releases.body:
- Support for BTTV seasonal emotes (SantaHat etc.)
- Added a "check for updates" button in the settings page
- Future proofed against a certificate bug

releases.name: Version 5.1
releases.body:
Bug fixes:
- The notification no longer plays the OS sound as well as Tc's sound. Only the latter
- Notifications now have an icon
- Fixed the white background on the viewer filter

releases.name: Version 5
releases.body:
- You can now filter the viewer list  
  The filter only shows up if there are more than 50 chatters

releases.name: Version 4.1
releases.body: - Fixes missing badges

releases.name: Version 4
releases.body:
Keyboard shortcuts! 
- `ctrl + s` toggle the sidebar
- `ctrl +n` new channel
- `ctrl + left`, `ctrl + right` cycle through tabs
- `ctrl + tab` cycle through tabs
- `ctrl + 2` go to 2nd tab
- `tab` focus the input
- Fixed a bug with missing badges in chat

releases.name: Version 3
releases.body:
- Host and unhost buttons 
- Bug fixes: no more duplicate messages when obtaining backlog

releases.name: Version 2.1.0
releases.body: - Fixed the broken tray icon. Clicking it now restores the window.

releases.name: Version 2
releases.body:
Don't panic! We're changing the release versions to be more user friendly. Can't wait for Tc to pass Chrome in version number 
- Windows users finally see emojis! (Thanks to the Chromium team)
- New option to hide timed messages completely

releases.name: Version 1.3.13
releases.body:
- New option for variable line heights. Enable it to prevent emote overlap.
- Sometimes lines wouldn't be highlighted with split chat enabled

releases.name: Version 1.3.12
releases.body: - Fix Livestreamer integration (It now uses Client ID)

releases.name: Version 1.3.11
releases.body:
- Added split chat (AKA Tiger striped).
- You can now make the window smaller, if you wish.

releases.name: Version 1.3.10
releases.body:
Some small changes users requested  
- You can now use @ for tab completion. There's no visual menu yet.
- Livestreamer support now respects your config file's default quality.

releases.name: Version 1.3.9
releases.body:
- Now supports all present and future chat badges, including Bits
- Supports Bit gifs in chat
- Resubs now show the custom message, if any (Emotes not yet supported in these)
- Fixed "emote-only mode" message not appearing

releases.name: Version 1.3.8
releases.body:
- Fixed some emotes not showing on your end, when you send them.
- Fixed /r (whisper reply).
- Dark mode "improvements". Give feedback if you don't like something.

releases.name: Version 1.3.7
releases.body:
- Moved to tmi.js 1.0.0 (This means new potential bugs, please give feedback)
- Added ban and timeout reasons and duration
- Fixed whispers not actually playing notifications
- Halved bandwidth usage (Now uses only one connection)
- Added support for server notices (E.g. Your message was not sent because you are sending messages too quickly.)

releases.name: Version 1.3.6
releases.body:
- Added [livestreamer](http://docs.livestreamer.io/) support! Play streams directly in VLC with it.
- Fixed broken links (the "&" character broke them)

releases.name: Version 1.3.5
releases.body:
- Fixed a crash that happened if you started Tc while on the "New Channel" tab.  
  This affected all fresh 1.3.4 installs :(

releases.name: Version 1.3.4
releases.body:
- Text Shortcuts! Check the settings menu for more info
- Loading backlog can no longer delete newer messages
- New [twitter](https://twitter.com/tctwitch)

releases.name: Version 1.3.3
releases.body: - Fixed the bug where loading backlog could cause newer messages to be lost

releases.name: Version 1.3.2
releases.body:
- Better links
- Fixed that issue where autoscroll would sometimes disable itself
- Should now be able to click the update button in order to restart Tc after an update

releases.name: Version 1.3.1
releases.body:
Some small fixes today :)
- Added a whisper button to the UI
- Fixed an intermittent issue where new chat would be deleted when loading backlog
- Badges now follow a more logical order, and are properly centered
- Badges now have tooltips
- Fixed the missing FFZ supporters badge
- Mid-sentence /shrug no longer sends an extra message
- Fade out the mod icons when you're not a mod in the channel
- You no longer _have_ to use the mouse scroll wheel to load backlog

releases.name: The Big Backlog Update
releases.body:
-  Cloud Backlog! Tc will download any messages you missed when you were offline
- Scroll up to load more messages, currently up to 48 hours back
- Emotes and links now work on incoming whispers. (And a better whisper system is in the works)
- Better scroll performance, though an even better version is coming (using a virtual list)
- Fixed sometimes having to press Tab more than once to cycle through emotes

This has been the biggest internal rewrite so far and will make future updates easier to implement.
Please report any new bugs to me on Twitter or on GitHub.

releases.name: Version 1.2.1
releases.body:
- Fixed _the_ memory leak, but there's still room for improvement
- R9k, chat clearing, slow mode, and subs only mode are now reported correctly

releases.name: The Big Mac Update
releases.body:
Now available for **OS X**!
- Newer engine means smooth scrolling and better performance!
- Dark mode improvements!
- Memes! /lenny /donger /shrug (A better system is coming too!)
- Various whisper fixes
- Added pretty loading animation
- Ignore list has its own entry in the settings menu
- Fixed the missing default picture for users

releases.name: Version 1.1.5
releases.body: - Fixed FrankerFaceZ emotes sometimes cutting messages short.

releases.name: Version 1.1.4
releases.body:
- Fixed broken FrankerFaceZ emotes :(
- Supports donor badges for FrankerFaceZ donors (no custom mod badges yet)

releases.name: Version 1.1.3
releases.body:
- Fixed whispers which got broken in the previous version
- Removed server migration notice

releases.name: Version 1.1.2
releases.body:
- Added support for BTTV channel emotes
- Tab completion is now alphabetical (usernames, BTTV and FFZ are still in order)

releases.name: Version 1.1.1
releases.body: - Now correctly handles wrong passwords

releases.name: Version 1.1.0
releases.body:
- Switched to the new chat cluster, more info [here](https://discuss.dev.twitch.tv/t/psa-chat-servers-are-going-to-migrate-to-aws-ec2-servers/4877/109).
- Retries to grab the user list more often if it failed the first time.
- Retries to grab the emote list if it failed.

releases.name: Version 1.0.11
releases.body: - Now remembers the window's position and size when restarting

releases.name: Version 1.0.10
releases.body: - Now uses gettc.xyz for password generation

releases.name: Version 1.0.9
releases.body: - Emote autocomplete! Type "fra" and hit tab to get FrankerZ

releases.name: Version 1.0.8
releases.body:
- Ability to start automatically with the OS. Right click the tray icon to enable
- Prevent multiple instances from launching
- Fixed the blank chat tab in settings
- People being ignored no longer trigger notifications
- Fixed the font, it was supposed to look like this the entire time!
- Improvements to scrolling

releases.name: Version 1.0.7
releases.body: - Fixed a bug where whispers would display twice

releases.name: Version 1.0.6
releases.body:
- Whisperers are now properly added to autocomplete
- Improved whisper connection reliability
- New installation splash screen
- Updating no longer recreates shortcuts

releases.name: Version 1.0.3
releases.body: - Fixed whispers server sometimes not reconnecting

releases.name: Version 1.0.2
releases.body: - Fixed installation issues with some Windows usernames

releases.name: Version 1.0.1
releases.body: - Removed the broken autocorrect, spell checking still works.

releases.name: Version 1.0.0
releases.body:
###### New domain! [gettc.xyz](http://gettc.xyz)

###### READ THIS: If you're upgrading from beta 17, uninstall it first.
- When upgrading from beta, your settings will be wiped. I'm sorry.
- All known reconnection bugs fixed
- Fixed bug that made it seem like it was disconnected
- Faster tab switching
- Scrolls all the way down when switching tab
- Doesn't require admin rights to install
- Basic spellchecker, English only for now
- Auto updater!

###### Known issues
- Using the wrong password won't give an error, but it won't connect. Simply log out and retry with your oauth password
- Window position and size is not remembered when reopening Tc
- Issues typing certain words, please report if you see letters changing position as you type

releases.name: Beta 17
releases.body:
- Ability to minimize the sidebar
- Ability to hide the video thumbnail
- Ability to hide the viewer list

releases.name: Beta 16
releases.body:
- Fixed viewer list color in dark mode
- Fixed missing icon in login screen

releases.name: Beta 15
releases.body:
- Press /r to reply to whispers
- Fixed tooltips only displaying once
- Now remembers the window size and location
- Performance improvements with viewer list
- Notification sound preview in the options

releases.name: Beta 14
releases.body: - Fixes an issue where messages would appear twice

releases.name: Beta 13
releases.body:
- Hover emotes to see their text
- Timeouts and bans now get a strike-through line
- Zoom functionality: ctrl + mouse wheel or in the options
- Fixed "More Messages" sometimes not going away

releases.name: Beta 12
releases.body:
- Fixed a breaking bug caused by a change on Twitch's end
- Finally addressed most re-connection issues (fingers crossed)
- Shows a message when autoscroll is disabled

releases.name: Beta 11
releases.body:
- Connections are now more reliable
- Tab Completion now uses proper capitals in usernames
- Text box in the new channel tab is now automatically focused

releases.name: Beta 10
releases.body:
- Now supports whispers! /w <username> <message>
- Switched to websockets instead of IRC! Used tmi.js
- Fixed the most common crash
- Fixed an issue where BTTV emotes would truncate a message

releases.name: Beta 9
releases.body: - New dark theme! (Aka dank mode)

releases.name: Beta 8
releases.body:
- Fixed middle mouse click bug on links
- Fixed disconnection message showing twice
- Fixed the alignment of emoticons
- Now shows desktop notification when a newer version is available

releases.name: Beta 7
releases.body:
- Bttv emotes!
- Fixed FrankerFaceZ emotes
- Fixed "true" name bug
- Emotes don't mess with line height anymore
- Press F12 to open developer tools and check errors

releases.name: Beta 6
releases.body:
- Now notifies you if a newer version is available!
- Fixed a bug where messages would appear twice
- Improved responsiveness when tabbing
- Added about page with version and link to website
- Shows counter with unread messages on each tab

releases.name: Beta 5
releases.body:
- Fixed 'hosting' spam
- Removed bogus <> from settings page

releases.name: Beta 4
releases.body:
- Fixed login issues: when using the wrong password format it would just hang
- Installer now lets you pick the install location

releases.name: Beta 3
releases.body:
- Fixed viewer list underline issue
- Clarified the login process

releases.name: Beta 2
releases.body:
- Fixed performance issues
- Fixed pink bar not updating for newly joined channel
- Fixed newly joined channel not being rendered properly
